targets.query: SELECT (mean("value")* 8192)/1024/1024/1024/1024 FROM "storage_data" WHERE "sensor" = 'volused' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT (mean("value")* 8192)/1024/1024/1024/1024 FROM "storage_data" WHERE "sensor" = 'volcapacity' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("disktemperature") FROM "storage_data" WHERE "diskname" = 'Disk_3' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("disktemperature") FROM "storage_data" WHERE "diskname" = 'Disk_4' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
